basics.name: Walther A. Seidel M.
basics.label: JR Developer | ReactJS | Astro | Node.js | PHP | Laravel | Linux | HTML | CSS | JavaScript
basics.summary: Hi everyone! I'm a Systems Engineer, graduated from the Cooperativa University of Colombia with a focus on web development. I have experience in technologies such as PHP, React.js, MongoDB, Laravel, Python, Pandas, and Linux. I'm a proactive, self-taught individual who loves learning new skills and technologies. During my university career, I was an active member of the free software dissemination group and contributed for several consecutive years to the Latin American Free Software Festival (FLISol). I'm passionate about development, especially FrontEnd with ReactJS and styling with TailwindCSS. I'm seeking an opportunity to apply my skills and strengthen my knowledge in the web development world. I'm committed to being a valuable asset to the company that gives me the opportunity to start my career. If you are interested in learning more about me or working together, please don't hesitate to contact me via email or WhatsApp. It would be a pleasure to meet for a coffee and discuss how I can contribute to your company..

work.name: ETM
work.summary: Route planning and scheduling for the SITM-MIO system,

work.name: ACAR
work.summary: Coordinate the day-to-day operations of the IT department and manage relationships with external technology providers.

work.name: Blanco y Negro Masivo
work.summary: Driver scheduling and rotation, and generation of payroll for hours worked..

work.name: Blanco y Negro Masivo
work.summary: Comprehensive review, analysis, and monitoring of operations utilizing technological platforms embedded within vehicles and those supplied by the R&T company within the M.I.O. Mass Integrated Transit System. Verification of settlements based on daily route audits of all vehicles. Detailed review and analysis of SITM-MIO operational logs. In-depth analysis of QRSF (Complaints, Claims, Requests, and Compliments) submitted through the user service line, ensuring timely and appropriate responses. Verification and investigation of all reports issued by the system's managing entity to Operators (vehicle drivers), leveraging available information technology platforms.

work.name: Union Temporal de Recaudo y Tecnología
work.summary: Generación de reporte diario de operación para la su revisión y posterior conciliación con los concesionarios de transporte del Sistema Integrado de Transporte Masivo M.I.O. (Masivo Integrado de Occidente) Análisis de información proveniente de los logs de los vehículos por medio de consultas generadas en la base de datos Oracle utilizando scripts directamente sobre esta o usando las plataformas proporcionadas por el sistema Precidir la reunión quincenal con los 4 COT y el ente gestor del SITM-MIO.

work.name: Servientrega
work.summary: Recepción de paquetes, documentos y mercancía para el despacho a nivel nacional e internacional Recepción y pago de giros a nivel nacional Fotocopias Manejo de caja.

work.name: Hospital San Ándres E.S.E.
work.summary: Soporte en las estaciones de trabajo a los usuarios finales Instalación de aplicativos especializados Instalación de SIIGO y InfoSalud, Configuración, reinstalación y adecuación de las estaciones de trabajo, servidores y redes.

volunteer.summary: Providing support in the kitchen by washing dishes and serving food to diners at the Caritas center in Ourense.
Informal tech gatherings in Cali, where attendees can share knowledge and connect with peers.
Contributing to the installation and dissemination of free software within the Santiago de Cali community.

projects.name: Proyecto Hoja de vida en la WEB
projects.description: Primer proyecto llevado a la practica y ejecutado para compartirlo en la web, los que habia hecho anteriormente nunca los habia sacado del ordenador, a pesar de que estaban en github no los habia compartido ni terminado
